function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Physical distancing guidelines based on country may vary, leading to confusion and inconsistency in implementation.","Impact":"Increased risk of contagion due to inconsistent physical distancing measures.","Mitigation":"Develop and implement standardized physical distancing guidelines at a global level.","Technologies":"Digital communication platforms for global coordination.","People":"General public, policy makers, and health authorities.","Owner":"Global health organizations and governments."},{"Description":"Challenges in maintaining physical distancing between partners and roommates in small apartments increase the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Higher likelihood of contagion within living spaces due to limited space for physical distancing.","Mitigation":"Promote creative space management strategies and provide guidelines for indoor physical distancing.","Technologies":"Smart home automation for space optimization.","People":"Apartment residents, landlords, and property management.","Owner":"Public health agencies and housing authorities."}]}
